Translations.Text: Renhe ren ye bupei yu an la duihua, chufei qishi, huo cong weimu de houmian, huo pai yige shizhe, feng ta de mingling er qishi tasuo yu qishi de. Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi rui de

Wo zheyang qishi ni cong wo de mingling zhong fachu de jingshen. Ni benlai bu zhidao tian jing shi shenme, zhengxin shi shenme; dan wo yi tian jing wei guangming, er jie ci guangming yindao wo suo yu yindao de puren. Ni que shi zhishi zhenglu zhe
Na shi an la de lu. Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Zhen de, wanshi zhi gui an la
Ha yi, mi mu
Yi mingbai de jingdian mengshi
wo que yi yi ci wei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian nimen liaojie
Zai wo nali de tian jing yuanben zhong, ta que shi gaoshang de, que shi ruizhi de
Nandao yinwei nimen shi guofen de minzhong, wo jiu shi nimen bude shou jiaoxun ma
Wo ceng paiqian xuduo xianzhi qu jiaohua gudai de minzu
mei ge xianzhi lailin tamen de shihou, tamen dou jiayi yunong
Wo ceng huimiele bi ni de zongzu geng qiangheng zhe, xian min de shili yi shiqule
Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“Wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu chuangzaole tiandi.”
Ta yi dadi wei nimen de anxi zhi suo, ta wei nimen zai da dishang kaipi xuduo daolu, yibian nimen dadao luxing de mudi de
Ta cong tianshang jiangxia you dingliang de yushui, jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Nimen jianglai yao zheyang cong fenmu zhong bei quchu
Ta chuangzao wan lei, er yi chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen qi cheng

yibian nimen duan zuo zai shangmian. Ranhou, zai duan zuo de shihou, xiangzhe nimen de zhu de endian, bingqie shuo:“Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta wei women zhifu ci wu, women duiyu ta ben shi wuneng
Women biding guiyu women de zhu.”
Tamen ba ta de yibufen puren, dang zuo tamen de fenzi; ren que shi mingxian de gu en zhe
Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de zhongsheng zhong zi qu nu'er, er yi nan'er zhuan gui nimen ma
Tamen wangyan zhiren zhu you nu'er, dan tamen zhong de yige ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lianse bian cheng andan de, erqie ta shi ao nu de
Zai shoushi zhong chang da, qie buneng xiongbian zhe,(nandao tamen yi ta gui an la ma)
Zhong tianshi ben shi an la de nupu, tamen que yi zhong tianshi wei nuxing. Tamen ceng jianzheng an la chuangzao tianshi ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu xialai, tamen ye jiang bei shenwen
Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo zhiren zhu yiyu, women shi bu hui chongbai tamen de.” Tamen duiyu ci shuo, hao wu renshi; tamen zhishi shuohuang hua
Nandao yiqian wo ceng ci tamen yi ben tian jing, er tamen shi jianchi na ben tian jing de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji er de zhengdao de.”

Zai ni zhiqian, mei feng wo zheyang paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshi qu, nali de haohua zhe zong shi shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji de.”
